mapper.select: select expect,${fieldCondition} from t_variety_current WHERE variety_type = #{varietyType} ORDER BY open_time DESC

select ball numberBall,ifnull(b.totalCount,0) todayAppear from ( select 1 ball union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9 union
select 0 select 10
union select 11 ) a left join (select ${field}, count(expect) totalCount FROM t_variety_current tv where variety_type = #{varietyType}
and left(tv.expect,8) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
and tv.open_time BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59')
and YEARWEEK(str_to_date(left(tv.expect,8), '%Y%m%d') - INTERVAL 1 DAY)= yearweek(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and YEARWEEK(date_format(open_time,'%Y-%m-%d') - INTERVAL 1 DAY) = yearweek(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and str_to_date(left(tv.expect,8), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CONCAT(date_format(LAST_DAY(now()),'%Y-%m-'),'01 00:00:00') and CONCAT(LAST_DAY(now()),' 23:59:59')
and tv.open_time BETWEEN CONCAT(date_format(LAST_DAY(now()),'%Y-%m-'),'01 00:00:00') and CONCAT(LAST_DAY(now()),' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY ${field}) b on a.ball = b.${field}

select expect,crown_sub from ((SELECT tv.expect,tv.crown_sub FROM `t_variety_current` tv WHERE variety_type = #{varietyType} AND crown_sub = #{crownSub} ORDER BY tv.open_time DESC LIMIT 2) UNION ALL (SELECT tv.expect,tv.crown_sub FROM `t_variety_current` tv WHERE variety_type = #{varietyType} ORDER BY tv.open_time DESC LIMIT 1)) a order by expect desc
SELECT tv.crown_sub crownSub, count(tv.expect) historyOmi FROM `t_variety_current` tv WHERE tv.variety_type = #{varietyType} GROUP BY tv.crown_sub
